reviewText: The instruction on this dvd is good for a beginning guitar player who wants to learn simple carter style solos. The tab is big help to anyone who will learn from it. I can't give it 5 stars for 1 reason . " Bury Me Beneath the Willow" , Is a good tune ,but not a gospel tune. Most of the tunes on here are really great for a beginner, but if you play at a little more advanced level, the strums patterns need to be beefed up a little.

In this day,and age it is quite easy to not understand which

format an item is in. Calling someone silly is mean. Any

technical,scientific person knows the difficulty today.
